contribute.title: Contribute Content
contribute.subtitle: Together we build Ca Mau's local education resources
contribute.selectTypeDesc: What would you like to contribute to Ca Mau's local education system?
contribute.newHeritageDesc: Suggest adding new educational content to the system
contribute.correctionDesc: Report incorrect information or request updates
contribute.additionalInfoDesc: Add detailed information to existing content
contribute.photoDesc: Share photos about Ca Mau region
contribute.copyrightConfirm: I confirm that I own or have the right to share these images, and allow their use in the Ca Mau Local Education project.
contribute.successMessage: Your contribution has been recorded and will be reviewed by the admin team. We will contact you if more information is needed.
contribute.infoNote: All contributions will be reviewed and verified before being added to the system. Your personal information (if provided) will be kept confidential.

about.title: Cultural Heritage
about.subtitle: A project to digitize and preserve the cultural heritage of the southernmost land of Vietnam, combining modern AI technology to bring heritage closer to everyone

heritage.title: 85+ Heritage Sites
heritage.description: Rich database of cultural heritage from Ca Mau - Bac Lieu

aiSupport.title: AI Support
aiSupport.description: Chat with AI to learn more about heritage

mission.title: Our
mission.paragraph1: We believe that preserving cultural heritage is not only a responsibility but also a source of pride for every Vietnamese citizen.
mission.paragraph2: The Heritage Web project is built with the goal of digitizing the entire cultural heritage treasure of Ca Mau and Bac Lieu, helping people and tourists easily access and learn about these unique cultural values.
mission.paragraph3: With the support of AI technology, users can interact, ask questions and explore heritage in a completely new way.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have ideas to contribute or want to collaborate? Contact us!
